description: Digital Carbon Credit token - 1 ESG-GOLD = 1 DC (Digital Carbon) = 1kg CO2 reduction

conversion_rate.description: 1 DC = 1kg CO2 reduction = 1,000,000 micro ESG-GOLD (with 6 decimals)

marketplace_discount.description: 10% of ESG-GOLD used for discounts is burned

offset_retirement.description: 100% burned when permanently retiring carbon credits
